name: Wiry Lady OP1
shortDescription: Premium loose leaf Ceylon black tea with rich aroma and smooth finish.
seoTitle: SAMLEY CEYLON – Loose Leaf Tea Ceylon Black Wiry Lady OP1 Premium Luxury Gourmet Tea from Sri Lanka – 125g
seoDescription: Experience premium Ceylon black tea crafted from long wiry leaves, delivering a rich aroma and smooth golden liquor.
longDescription: Experience authentic Ceylon black tea with Wiry Lady OP1, featuring clean long-wiry dark leaves and a golden-orange brew. This premium loose leaf tea offers a malt-infused aroma and a smooth, sophisticated taste crafted for true tea connoisseurs.
features: Ideal for daily luxury tea moments
